release_notes: CRITICAL FIX: Write all environment variable values directly into docker-compose.yml instead of using ${VARIABLE} substitution. Docker compose variable substitution was unreliable causing FR24, PiAware, and other services to not receive their configuration. Now all services get actual values written: FR24KEY=xxx, FEEDER_ID=xxx, etc. Config rebuilds automatically when enabling FR24 to ensure key is written.
